ygData.subject: Whistling Dagger/Sainy's Singing Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: My guild raided Droga this weekend and I got a Whistling Dagger (6/25 1AC bard only).  Pretty wimpy weapon based on the difficulty required to get it. By the
ygData.messageBody:
My guild raided Droga this weekend and I got a Whistling Dagger (6/25 1AC
bard only). Pretty wimpy weapon based on the difficulty required to get it.
By the time you are high enough level to kill the mob that drops it, you
almost certainly already have a better weapon than this.

I checked the spoilers sites and EQLizer lists this weapon as dropping in
Mines of Nurga, not Droga. Supposedly Sainy's Singing Dagger (7/22 procs
Symphonic Harmony) drops in Droga, which would be more appropriate in
regards to risk/reward. I heard a rumor that the SSD was dropping when
Kunark first came out but it was since removed from the drop table for some
reason. I'm guessing the Whistling Dagger was put into its place and now
drops in both Droga and Nurga. Does anyone know the real deal on this? If
the SSD is still dropped in Droga, does anyone know what mob drops it and
its location?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
